paragraphs: Andaman & Nicobar Islands Institute of Medical Sciencespopularly known as “ANIIMS Port Blair” is a Central Government funded institute located in Port Blair, Andaman & Nicobar Islands. ANIIMS is affiliated with Pondicherry University and approved by the National Medical Council (NMC). ANIIMS Port Blair along with GB Pant Hospital works as a Referral Hospital for all the Hospitals & Healthcare Centers situated in the Andaman & Nicobar Islands.

The institute’s most popular course offered at ANIIMS is a flagship program of MBBS.ANIIMS Port Blair offers a total of 114 seats annually for MBBS course.The institute offers merit scholarships provided by the central government for students based on family income.A 6-month internship is also provided to MBBS students after the completion of their academic years.
The institute’s most popular course offered at ANIIMS is a flagship program of MBBS.
ANIIMS Port Blair offers a total of 114 seats annually for MBBS course.
The institute offers merit scholarships provided by the central government for students based on family income.
A 6-month internship is also provided to MBBS students after the completion of their academic years.

paragraphs: ANIMS Port Blair offers admission to MBBS courses for the duration of 5.5 years for candidates with valid score in the NEET UG conducted by the NTA. Candidates must appear forNEET Counsellingconducted by the Medical Counselling Committe (MCC).

General_Info.heading: How to Apply for ANIIMS Port Blair Admission?

paragraphs: Candidates can apply for ANIIMS Port Blair Admission by following the steps mentioned below:

The candidates seeking admission to MBBS course should apply through common college admission portal with the URL https://collegeadmission.andaman.gov.in. The students are required to access the portal through internet or through common service centre(CSC) nearby them. The students have to fill the details completely through online application and upload the scanned copy of following documents to apply for admission in the college:.

Visit the official website of admission portal @collegeadmission.andaman.gov.in.Fill out the application with required details and upload the documents.Submit the application and pay the requisite fees.Candidates can check the counselling schedule on the admission portal/college website.On selection, candidates must report the college for documents verification & medical examination.
Visit the official website of admission portal @collegeadmission.andaman.gov.in.
Fill out the application with required details and upload the documents.
Submit the application and pay the requisite fees.
Candidates can check the counselling schedule on the admission portal/college website.
On selection, candidates must report the college for documents verification & medical examination.

ANIIMS Port Blair MBBS Cutoff 2024 will be released soon after the results are published. The ANIIMS NEET UG Cutoff 2023 for all the rounds has been announced. Here is the round-wiseANIIMS Port Blair Cutofffor various categories.

ANIIMS Port Blair offers students with merit scholarships. Candidates must register themselves with the administrative office and are required to fill an application form and attach the required documents. Students can also avail of education loans provided by a number of banks such as Bank of Baroda, State Bank of India, Central Bank of India, etc. The institute provides the following scholarships for meritorious and students with low family income:

National Merit Scholarship:The institute offers Merit & National Scholarships for brilliant students under Central & State Government.Fee concessionsare also given to students with low family income on displaying income certificates.
National Merit Scholarship:The institute offers Merit & National Scholarships for brilliant students under Central & State Government.
Fee concessionsare also given to students with low family income on displaying income certificates.
Ques. What is the application process at Andaman & Nicobar Islands Institute of Medical Sciences?

Ans.To apply for admission at ANIIMS, candidates are required to fill an application form which can be obtained from the college office along with a brochure upon payment of INR 1000. Application forms can also be downloaded from the official website and submitted in person or through post upon completion along with the demand draft of INR 1000 drawn in favor of The Director, Andaman and Nicobar Islands Institute of Medical Sciences (ANIIMS)” payable at Port Blair.
Ques. What are the documents required for filling the Andaman & Nicobar Islands Institute of Medical Sciencesapplication form?
Ans.The following documents are required:

Marksheet of Class 10thMarksheet of Class 12thAdmit card, Rank Card, Scorecard of NEETGAP certificate (if applicable)Transfer certificateMigration CertificateNationality CertificateCategory CertificateCaste CertificateMedical CertificateUndertaking formFee receiptPhoto Id proofSpecified Reservation Claim Certificate.

Ques. Does Andaman & Nicobar Islands Institute of Medical Sciencesfollow seat reservation?

Ans.Yes, the institute follows seat reservation. There is a relaxation of 5% for General-Physically Handicapped candidates and 10% for SC, ST, OBC, PH-SC, ST, OBC category students. Moreover, 10 seats out of the total 100 seats in the course are reserved for foreign national students.
Ques. Is the institute Andaman & Nicobar Islands Institute of Medical Sciencesapproved?
Ans.Yes, ANIIMS is affiliated with Pondicherry University and approved by the Medical Council of India. It was established in the year 2015.
Ques. What are the facilities provided to students at Andaman & Nicobar Islands Institute of Medical Sciences?

Ans.The College provides facilities such as well-furnished girls/boys hostels, a library consisting of 4052 Titles 42 Medical Journals Subscribed, transportation facilities, computer center, and research facilities.

Admission.heading: Andaman & Nicobar Islands Institute of Medical Sciences - [ANIIMS] Latest Updates

paragraphs: MCC NEET UG Counselling 2024is ongoing for admission to All-India Quota MBBS/ BDS/ B.Sc Nursing Seats. The online registration for Round 3 of NEET UG Counselling 2024 is scheduled from October 3 to October 8, 2024 (12 PM). The online choice filling and locking is from October 5 to October 8, 2024 (11:55 PM). Candidates can register and fill in their choices @ mcc.nic.in. The Round 3 Seat Allotment Result will be released on October 11, 2024. Candidates who wish to surrender/ resign their seat allotted in Round 1 or Round 2 can do the same by October 1, 2024 (5 PM).

ANIIMS Port Blair Admission is offered for the MBBS program based on merit in NEET UG.  ANIIMS is affiliated with Pondicherry University and approved by the National Medical Council (NMC). ANIIMS Port Blair along with GB Pant Hospital works as a Referral Hospital for all the Hospitals & Healthcare Centers situated in the Andaman & Nicobar Islands. ANIMS Port Blair offers a total of 114 seats annually for the MBBS course. A mandatory 6-month internship is also provided to MBBS students after the completion of their academic years.
Read More:ANIIMS Port Blair Fees Structure
Table of Content
Some of the important highlights of ANIIMS Port Blair are tabulated below:

Andaman & Nicobar Islands Institute of Medical Sciences(ANIIMS)offers Bachelor of Medicine & Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) course of 4 ½ years duration followed by one year compulsory rotatory internship. Candidates who have passed Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and English individually at 10+2 level examination and scored minimum 50% marks in Physics, Chemistry, Biology/ Biotechnology taken together are eligible to appear in National Eligibility-cum-Entrance Test (NEET-UG) examination.

The course has an intake of 100 students.Admission to the eligible candidates is done on the basis of marks scored in NEET-UG through counseling.There is a relaxation of 5% for General-Physically Handicapped candidates and 10% for SC, ST, OBC, PH-SC, ST, OBC category students.10 seats in the course are reserved for foreign national students.Applicant must be born on or before January 01, 2001.

ANIIMS Port Blair offers admission to MBBS courses for the duration of 5.5 years for candidates with valid score in the NEET UG conducted by the NTA. Candidates must appear forNEET Counsellingconducted by the Medical Counselling Committe (MCC).
Candidates can apply for ANIIMS Port Blair Admission by following the steps mentioned below:

The candidates seeking admission to MBBS course should apply through common college admission portal with the URL https://collegeadmission.andaman.gov.in. The students are required to access the portal through internet or through common service centre(CSC) nearby them. The students have to fill the details completely through online application and upload the scanned copy of following documents to apply for admission in the college:.

Visit the official website of admission portal @collegeadmission.andaman.gov.in.Fill out the application with required details and upload the documents.Submit the application and pay the requisite fees.Candidates can check the counselling schedule on the admission portal/college website.On selection, candidates must report the college for documents verification & medical examination.

General_Info.heading: About Dr. B R Ambedkar Institute of Technology

paragraphs: Dr B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technologyis a private Institute which was established in 1984. The Institute is accredited with B+ grade by NAAC with a score of 2.6 on a 4 point scale and has also been affiliated to Indian Maritime University, Chennai.

Dr B.R.Ambedkar institute of technology (Dr B.R. Ambedkar Govt polytechnic ) offers Degree programme, Diploma programme, Maritime programme and Skill development programme in the field of Engineering & technology. However New courses were offered in 2009 like the B.tech programme and many non-formal programmes were also added later on.
Admission to the courses is based on Merit and the mode of application is both online and offline.

General_Info.heading: Dr B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair: Highlights

tables.1: Pondicherry University, Board of Technical education New Delhi, Maharashtra state Board of technical education, All India Council for technical education(AICTE)
Library, Hostel, Sports, Medical facilities, Transportation etc.

General_Info.heading: Dr B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair: Rank

paragraphs: The Institute has been ranked 201 in 2020 and 198 in 2019 for B.Tech according to the NIRF report.

tables.Details: Specializations- Computer science & engineering, Civil engineering and Electronics & Communication  Eligibility - Diploma pass in three-year diploma or Four-year diploma course in engineering /technology from a recognised institute with a minimum of 45%. OR B.Sc. degree holders with a minimum of 45% from a recognised institute and with maths as a compulsory subject in 10+2.  Duration- 4 years

Specializations- Civil engineering, Computer engineering, Electrical engineering, Mechanical engineering, Electronics and communication and Information and technology  Eligibility- 10th pass with 35% in mathematics & science from recognised board & institute. OR 12th pass with 45% in Mathematics, Physics & Chemistry from a recognized board or institution.  Duration- 3years

General_Info.heading: Dr B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair: Admission

paragraphs: Admissions at Dr.B.R. Ambedkar institute of technology is based on the Merit marks of the candidates. The candidate can apply for admission both in Offline and Online mode. The Offline application form can be filled at the Common service centre. Interested candidates can apply for admission through the website on Department of higher education of Andaman & Nicobar Common online admission portal for college. Below is the stepwise details on how to apply through online mode.

Candidates must visit the official website of the college and go to the admission portal.After opening the Portal https://collegeadmission.andaman.gov.in/#no-back-button. The candidate needs to fill in the necessary details like Name, Father Name, Age, Date of Birth, Address, Category, Aadhar card and Bank detail.The candidates will need to fill the marks of the qualifying and other details necessary for admissionThe candidates will need to select the Campus and Courses they want to apply for.Lastly, the candidate will need to upload their recent photo and document such as Mark sheets etc in JPG format.
Candidates must visit the official website of the college and go to the admission portal.

After opening the Portal https://collegeadmission.andaman.gov.in/#no-back-button. The candidate needs to fill in the necessary details like Name, Father Name, Age, Date of Birth, Address, Category, Aadhar card and Bank detail.
The candidates will need to fill the marks of the qualifying and other details necessary for admission
The candidates will need to select the Campus and Courses they want to apply for.
Lastly, the candidate will need to upload their recent photo and document such as Mark sheets etc in JPG format.

General_Info.heading: Dr B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair: Placement

paragraphs: Dr.B.R. Ambedkar institute of technology provides training & placement by organising various training and placement activities within the college. Training cell provides the Audiovisual wing and infrastructural support from it, students, to equip them with basic training aids. Dr.B.R. Ambedkar institute of technology provides technical training for students and also provides soft skill training for B.tech students. According to the NIRF, 2020 (DCS) report the placement of the Undergraduate programme students is mentioned in the tabular form below.

General_Info.heading: Dr B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair: Facilities

paragraphs: Hostels-The college provides a Separate Hostel facility for boys and girls. Hostel facilities are only available for students from other islands.

Library-The institute’s library has all the modern facilities like software, Barcoding of the books etc. It has collections of over 43600 books from all the disciplines. The central library is equipped with reference books, international journals and periodicals for its various programs offered by the United college of engineering & management. The library is spread over 25,000 sq. ft. collectively and it has access to Online journals.

Sports-The college has a multipurpose hall for sports-related facilities for example for Basketball, Volleyball, Badminton, etc and all indoor games. The multipurpose hall entertains the activities that take place within the college.
The Audiovisual Lab-for the practical knowledge of the concerned subjects. Labs are equipped with all the necessary types of equipment like LCD, CD’s etc for empowering the skills of its students.
Medical facilities-First aid cell is provided by the college for all the urgent requirements. A full-time pharmacist is also employed at the college premises.
Transport facility-The college provides transport facilities to students and staff members of the college. Bus charges are nominal.

General_Info.heading: Dr B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair: Faculty

paragraphs: 40+ experienced faculty at the Dr.B.R. Ambedkar institute of technology. Below is the tabular form of the same.
Ques. Is the infrastructure at the Dr.B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair is equipped with aids for handicapped students?
Ans.Yes the college infrastructure that has walking aids like wheelchairs etc. However, lifts/Ramps/ Specially designed toilets only cover 40% of the buildings.
Ques. What other courses offered by the Dr.B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair?

Ans.Dr.B.R. Ambedkar institute of technology offers skill development programmes of different durations ranging from 02 months to 01 years. Technical and vocational education & training courses like office automation, multimedia etc. Community development through polytechnic includes Automotive repair etc courses.
Ques. What is the Reservation criteria of seats at Dr.B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair?

Ans.As per the guideline of Andaman and Nicobar administration. 20% belongs to the Tribal 10% to the employee on deputation etc. Other categories such as settlers before 1942 had 50% seats. This criterion is for the B.tech programme offered by the institute.
Ques. What is the evaluation pattern of the degree courses offered by the Dr.B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair?

Ans.For degree courses offered at the Dr.B.R. Ambedkar institute of technology Marks out of total marks of 100 is used for grading candidates performance. However, the institute also follows the Letter grade to report its student's performance.
Ques. What is the fee structure of the Degree courses at the Dr.B.R. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Port Blair?

Ans.The fees are subject to vary as per the official website of the college a total fee of Rs 7,083 for the semester. The fee is inclusive of Semester fee, Exam fee, Lab fee, Library fee, Admission fee(once) etc.

paragraphs: Jawaharlal Nehru Rajkeeya Mahavidyalaya (JNRM),situated in Port Blair is a renowned Arts and Science College in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands. And it is the first college of its kind to be established in the Union Territory. It was instituted in the year 1967. Since inception it’s been rendering a tremendous job in educating the tribes and the relocated people for the past four decades. It offers Undergraduate as well as Postgraduate courses in the arts, science and commerce streams. The specializations offered in each stream counts to 16 in the Degree level and more than 9 in the Masters level respectively. JNRM’s vision is to provide a learning environment which would tailor the needs of young aspirants. Its curriculum emphasizes on academics, sports and also extra-curricular activities which in turn molds a student with all necessary skills needed to succeed in the present day competitive world.

General_Info.heading: About Tagore Government College of Education

paragraphs: Tagore Government College of Education in Andaman and Nicobar Islands Port Blairhas played very vital role in prompting the education in India and from this college we can get better, skilled and competent teachers every year. Due to this reason, most of the students who want to get into teaching line prefer to take admission in this college. This college is affiliated by Punjab University and come into recognition in the year 1981. The history of this college is very interesting. In first attempt they took 50 trainees and then they put all the focus on the 50 students and get better skills. The College is also put as the Centre for various Exams. The exams like Sainik School and SSC, RIMC, Distance Education programmers Madras, Alagappa University, Madurai Kamraj University, Punjab Technical University etc.  The new building of this college was made in the year 2004 in April.

tables.1: 8500 books are there in the library. These books are available to read or get issued. There is reading, reference, journal section of books that can help the students a lot.

Why to join theTagore Government College of Education?
1. Encourages Students for better and bright future: -

The main reason to join the Tagore college of education is that here student’s get a chance to learn best things, good habits from their faculties.  The faculty of the college is well trained and qualified and has immense experience so that they can assist their students at each and every step.
2. Promoting students in various extracurricular activities: -
There are all types of facilities and extracurricular activities available in the Tagore Government College of Education.
